Specialist Adequacy Calculation

\[\begin{equation}
{Adequacy = {Number\;of\;specialists}_{Actual} - {Number\;of\;specialists}_{Median}}
\tag{1}
\end{equation}\]

derived from
\[\begin{equation}
{{Number\;of\; specialists}_{Median} = {Manpower\;Rate}_{Median} \times  \left( \displaystyle \frac{Admissions}{1000}\right) }
\tag{2}
\end{equation}\]

derived from
\[\begin{equation}
{Manpower\;Rate = {Number\;of\; specialists} \div \left( \displaystyle \frac{Admissions}{1000}\right) }
\tag{3}
\end{equation}\]

articles.title: General Medical Admissions Workload 2022 and Specialist Adequacy
articles.description:
***Curated by Dr Saiful Safuan Md Sani***
_MRCP(London) MRCP(UK) MA(Cantab) MBBS(London)_
_Consultant Physician (Acute Internal Medicine)_
articles.contents:
Workload should dictate amount of manpower.

CAUTION: fair distribution requires consideration and information on:
 1. outpatient clinic volume,
 2. daycare volume,
 3. procedure volume,
 4. referral workload,
 5. fulfilling demands for up-to-date treatment provided by a subspecialty.
